item.description:

item.title: Beogram 4002 Type 5513: Going Through the Service Manual Checks and Adjustments
item.description:
This past weekend, I began working on some of the checks and adjustments outlined in the Beogram 4002 service manual. The manual details both electrical and mechanical procedures. On the electrical side, my primary focus is to ensure that the photo sensors generate strong signals when activated by their light sources.
